caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA v. KENNETH GLATH.

court.center: Court of Appeal of Louisiana, Third Circuit.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM 15TH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF LAFAYETTE, STATE OF LOUISIANA, HONORABLE MICHAEL SULLIVAN, J.
opinion.attorneys:
Charles Pesson, Lomax Jordan, Lafayette, for appellant.
David Hutchins, Asst. Dist. Atty., Lafayette, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before GUIDRY, FORET and KING, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ denied: There is no error in the trial court's ruling. The June 1988 Regulations promulgated by the Louisiana Department of public safety satisfy the objections raised in State v.Rowell, 517 So.2d 799 (La. 1988).
